node.title: Add Prism.js â€“ Syntax highlighter to Website
node.excerpt: Prism.js is a light-weight, open-source, easy-to-use syntax highlighter that can be added to your website and blogs in minutes.

node.title: A deep dive into the Java lambda expressions
node.excerpt: Lambda expressions are introduced in java8 version.Let us look about Lamda expressions in detail.
